title.rendered: I put a hat and scarf on!

content.rendered: I don’t normally just blatently post cute pictures of my son on the internet, but he walks up today – mid June – and says “I put a hat and scarf on!” Adorable!

excerpt.rendered: I put a hat and scarf on!
